title: Instrument Calibration Download Flow Chart

body.body: If the download fails to complete, turn the ignition Off and allow the motorcycle to power down (approximately one minute) before restarting the download. If the download continues to fail, see
Instrument Calibration - Failed Download Recovery Flow Chart

metadata.products: DS4; DR4; D74; D71; VW3; VV3; YL1; YK1; YJ1; DSB; DSA; DSX; DS1; NN6; VT3; VS3; VN3; VR3; VM3
